Label: Narrative
Text: The MOVING reference member state of this VC (Value Chain) is PORTUGAL ESTRELA. The reference MOVING Card ID of this VC is VC 08 PT2. Heather Honey is collected from hives located at Serra da Estrela highlands. Product sold locally and nationally.   The reference mountain chain of this VC is Cordilheira Central (RR08). The reference mountain landscape of this VC is Seia. Located on the western slope of Serra da Estrela, Seia is a municipality with 21 parishes, in the district of Guarda in the Centre region of Portugal. Seia shares with the municipalities of Covilh√£ and Manteigas, the highest point in mainland Portugal at 1993 meters of altitude. Seia has a strong industrial tradition, mainly related to textiles and the distribution of electricity. The production of sheep's cheese is also a tradition.   The size of the area (km2) is 435.41. The minimum altimetry of the LAU (Local Administrative Unit) is 159. The maximum altimetry of the LAU is 1993. The total population (in thousand) is 22.234. The population density (Inhabitants/km2) in the LAU is 51. The population change rate of the LAU in the last 10 years (%) has been -0.11%. The overall regional population density (Inhabitants/km2) is 78.6. The regional population change rate in the last 10 years (%) has been -0.05%.   The average per capita income (EUR/year) [Province] is 13122.59. The total Gross Value Added (GVA) (EUR million/year) [Province] is 2534.72. The primary sector share of total GVA/year [Province] is 3.67%. The secondary sector share of total GVA/year [Province] is 24.16%. The tertiary sector share of total GVA/year [Province] is 72.00%. The per capita income (EUR/year) [Region] is 16576.33. The total Gross Value Added (GVA) (EUR million/year) [Region] is 33268.83. The primary sector share of total GVA/year [Region] is 3.44%. The secondary sector share of total GVA/year [Region] is 30.35%. The tertiary sector share of total GVA/year [Region] is 67.00%.   The total number of bed places (BPs) in tourist accommodations/year in the LAU (Local Administrative Unit) is 1245. The regional (Region) share of total BPs/year is 1.96%. The number of agricultural holdings in the LAU is 1728. The nearest settlement with population over 100000 (km) is 64.2. In this region protected areas are present.   The primary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is 20.11%. The secondary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is 34.59%. The tertiary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is 45.30%. The primary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 13.25%. The secondary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 48.20%. The tertiary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 38.55%.   Heather is a characteristic bush of the highlands of Serra da Estrela. Product available through e-commerce. Product characteristic of the MRL. Product highly connected to local natural asset.   At Serra da Estrela, heatherlands of Erica sp. and Calluna vulgaris appear above 800/900 meters of altitude.    Are pesticides and the asian wasp threatening bees survival at Serra da Estrela? Will climate change affect heatherlands distribution?. Overall the type of challenge faced by this VC is Current and Predicted. This VC is classified as Traditional.   The type of innovation of this VC (Value Chain) is unspecified. The innovation is related to the whole VC. The land use systems involved are N/A. The local assets include Natural.   This product may be produced in different municipalities at Serra da Estrela.
